channel.title: How i let only staff wear this arm
channel.description:
hi
i maded a pvp server but
i got a freaking strong arm
EVERY 1 wears it u only see it
but i want that only staff can wear idk how
plz help

item.title: How i let only staff wear this arm
item.dc:creator: @maxxy2 maxxy2
item.description:
@maxxy2 wrote:

after you do the code for staff only,

} else if (playerRights >= 1) {

then do the removePlayerEquipment[playerWeapon] string

Read full topic
